title: Aboriginal Family Education Centre: Alexandria 1972
brief_description: A record of the Van Leewin project’s Aboriginal Family Education Centre in Redfern, Sydney. Parents learn with their children, mothers record the children’s activities with video. Differences between black and white cultural values are articulated and clarified.
